snippet.title: Dead State 2014 Trailer
snippet.description:
Dead State - The Survival RPG. A classic RPG with thousands of lines of reactive dialogue, exploration, turn-based combat, and base management. Lead a group of survivors over the months after society's collapse and deal with the persistent threat of other humans. Avoid the Dead - Fear the Living!

Now in Beta on Steam Early Access.
